title: THAT Conference WI 2023
html:
Thank you for attending my talk: Demystifying Deployments as a Service.

Slides: https://github.com/bmorrisondev/talks/blob/main/demystify-deployment-as-a-service/Demystifying Deployment as a Service.pdf

Here are some services you can use to get started building your own pipelines! This is by no mean an exhaustive list of tools, just something to get you started. If there is something missing you think should be here, reach out to me on my socials here: brianmm.dev

Orchestration

  • Flight Control
  • AWS CodePipeline
  • GitHub Actions
  • Azure Pipelines
  • CircleCI
  • Jenkins
  • Octopus Deploy
  • GitLab CI

File hosing/storage

  • AWS S3
  • Azure Storage Accounts
  • GitHub Pages
  • Digital Ocean Spaces

CDN

  • CloudFlare
  • AWS Cloudfront
  • Azure CDN
  • Google Cloud CDN

Backend code execution

  • AWS Lambda
  • CloudFlare Workers
  • Azure Functions
  • Google Cloud Functions

Routing

  • AWS CloudFront
  • AWS API Gateway
  • Azure API Management

Authentication

  • AWS Cognito
  • Azure AD
  • Clerk.dev
  • Auth0

Infrastructure as code tools

  • AWS SAM
  • AWS CloudFormation
  • Azure ARM
  • Pulumi
  • SST
  • Serverless Framework
  • Terraform
